email_body: No, i thought you would have known. don't tell shank i told you. Jennifer Burns 10/22/2000 07:24 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: WHAT????????? You are shitting me!!!!!! I heard someone call my name and I was like hey Bill. Weird huh?
